name: PvZ: Defend your House
description:
Welcome to PvZ: Defend your House, is my fan game, i made that because is my game to itch.io and i wanna put something here

Graphics and Sounds: PopCap

Music by Laura Shigihara

Code, Game by Tubbiealismo

Game made with Scratch

Why made on Scratch?

I made on Scratch, because is easy for me, its easy make some games, animations, musics...and more! and i a lazybones, i have some big games to launch: Mr.Mix, PvZ 3, Bee Adventure 3D: Bees Fly on Air, its hard to make this games, is so much codes! and is here!

New things on game!

*2 Player Compatible

*New version for Android!

PvZ Amino!
